Uses of Class
umontreal.iro.lecuyer.simprocs.ProcessSimulator

  • Packages that use ProcessSimulator 
    Package Description
    umontreal.iro.lecuyer.simprocs  

    • Uses of ProcessSimulator in umontreal.iro.lecuyer.simprocs

      Subclasses of ProcessSimulator in umontreal.iro.lecuyer.simprocs 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DSOLProcessSimulator
      Represents a simulation process whose actions method is interpreted by the DSOL interpreter, written by Peter Jacobs (http://www.tbm.tudelft.nl/webstaf/peterja/index.htm).
      class  ThreadProcessSimulator
      Represents a process simulator using Java threads for process synchronization.
      Fields in umontreal.iro.lecuyer.simprocs declared as ProcessSimulator 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected ProcessSimulator SimProcess.sim 
      Methods in umontreal.iro.lecuyer.simprocs that return ProcessSimulator 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ProcessSimulator ProcessSimulator.newInstance()
      Constructs and returns a new process-oriented simulator.
      Methods in umontreal.iro.lecuyer.simprocs with parameters of type ProcessSimulator 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Bin.setSimulator(ProcessSimulator sim)
      Set the current simulator of this continuous-time variable.
      Constructors in umontreal.iro.lecuyer.simprocs with parameters of type ProcessSimulator 
      Constructor and Description
      Bin(ProcessSimulator sim)
      Constructs a new bin, initially empty, with service policy FIFO and linked with simulator sim.
      Bin(ProcessSimulator sim, String name)
      Constructs a new bin, initially empty, with service policy FIFO, identifier name and linked with simulator sim.
      Condition(ProcessSimulator sim, boolean val)
      Constructs a new Condition with initial value val, linked with simulator sim.
      Condition(ProcessSimulator sim, boolean val, String name)
      Constructs a new Condition with initial value val, identifier name and linked with simulator sim.
      Resource(ProcessSimulator sim, int capacity)
      Constructs a new resource linked with the simulator sim, with initial capacity capacity, and service policy FIFO.
      Resource(ProcessSimulator sim, int capacity, String name)
      Constructs a new resource linked with the simulator sim, with initial capacity capacity, service policy FIFO, and identifier (or name) name.
      SimProcess(ProcessSimulator sim)
      Constructs a new process associated with sim without scheduling it.
